channel.title: Help! Plz anyone? Cape Glitches
channel.description: I am using Project dungeon fest 562 loading 659 it works fine but when i wear a cape or something else i get this [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kWwmSCbXkhc/TqP-DF84BAI/AAAAAAAAAN8/JaIrd_9G9cU/s1600/dont%2Bwork.png" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left:1em; margin-right:1em">

item.title: Help! Plz anyone? Cape Glitches
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:24, topic:419226”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=521759.msg3792049#msg3792049 date=1319371079]

I am using Project dungeon fest 562 loading 659 it works fine but when i wear a cape or something else i get this

I am using jdk.1.6.0_26 for the source and i tried jdk.1.7.0 and jdk.1.7.0_01 both don’t work. I used jre7 and jre6 for the client and i get the cape glitch maybe u can help?

I have put this here becuase everyone looks forward for project dungeon fest 562/659 and i thought people would now about it
[/quote]its because of the LD now gtfo this topic

Troll some more?

Computer needs to be banned, none of his topics have been in the correct section.

Gtfo off this topic.

This needs to go under help section.
If not you will not get a awnser.

This is in the help section?

OT: Try setting your item def values to 10? See if that helps. Not very good with 562’s. >:O[/quote]

I think the 668 item defintions dont work because project dungeon fest item definitions contains customs or something else maybe i don’t know i just want someone to fix it

Read full topic
